content: materials purl soho s quartz 1 65% merino wool and 35% suri alpaca each skein of this fingering-weight yarn is 420 yards/ 100 grams - main color mc 1 skein approximately 215 yards required we used the color peony pink - contrast color cc 1 skein approximately 60 yards required we used the color autumn oak you ll also need - us 3 3 25 mm 16- or 24-inch circular knitting needles 2 - four 3/8-inch buttons 3 we used our small corozo buttons 4 in kiln red note this is enough yarn to make two oppositely colored sweaters note an earlier version of this pattern used 5 skeins of purl soho s posy 5 no longer available for more on this version visit the original blog post 6 gauge 28 stitches and 56 row 28 ridges = 4 inches in garter stitch size newborn-6 months - finished chest circumference 18¼ inches - finished length from bottom hem to top shoulder 9 inches - finished length from bottom hem to underarm 5½ inches designed by purl soho designer whitney van nes 7 1 https //www purlsoho com/quartz html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--fasteners html 4 https //www purlsoho com/small-corozo-button html 5 https //www purlsoho com/posy 6 https //www purlsoho com/create/2019/03/20/little-baby-sweater-in-posy/ 7 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/whitney-van-nes-for-purl-soho/
